content:
During the day, Russian troops inflicted 319 beats on 9 settlements of Zaporizhzhya region.

About thisreportedHead of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov.

The Russian servicemen made 4 aviation strikes on the robot, Novoandriivtsi, Levadny and Small Tokmachka, as well as 32 times attacked the drones of Gulyaipole, small Tokmachka, Levadne, Malinivka, Novoandriivka and Robne.

283 Artillery strikes were taken across the territory of Gulyaypol, Robot, Willow, Transfiguration, Malynivka, Little Tokmachka, Levadny, Novoandriivka and Stepnogorsk.

There were 35 reports of destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure. The civilians were not injured.

As reported by the Armyinform, in Kiev as a result of rocket attack of the Russian Federationaffected10 people.
title: In the Zaporozhye region, the enemy made more than 300 shelling per day

author: Army Inform
